content: Hello, Bitcointalk community!I have an exclusive opportunity to supercharge your brand's visibility with our unique PR service: "Contributed Posts" on 650+ top media outlets, including Forbes, Entrepreneur, USA Today, Coin Telegraph, Yahoo, and more.Why settle for sponsored content when you can have authentic contributed posts? Benefit from more views, higher engagement, and genuine audience trust.The best part? Our PR service can be fully tailored to your brand's specific needs. Whether it's targeting a particular geographical area, specific demographics, physiographic preferences, or working within your budget constraints – we've got you covered.Our rates are unbeatable, and many media agencies are already taking advantage of this game-changing service.Interested in learning more? Let's chat         What sets my services apart:Comprehensive PR Strategies: I work closely with you to develop a tailored PR strategy that aligns with your project's goals, whether it's launching of new project , promoting a existing project, or enhancing your project's overall reputation.Media Relations: Leveraging my extensive network of industry-specific media contacts, I proactively engage with journalists, influencers, and thought leaders to secure high-quality media coverage for your project. I ensure that your message reaches the right platforms, generating maximum exposure and driving meaningful engagement.Content Creation and Distribution: I excel at creating compelling content that captivates audiences and effectively communicates your project's value proposition. From press releases and blog posts to social media content and thought leadership articles, I tailor the messaging to resonate with your target audience. I also employ strategic distribution channels to amplify your content's reach.Crisis Management: In the event of a crisis or negative publicity, I provide prompt and effective crisis management services. I work diligently to protect your project's reputation and mitigate any potential damage, ensuring a swift recovery and maintaining stakeholder confidence.I am passionate about the blockchain and cryptocurrency industry, and I am committed to delivering exceptional results for my clients. Whether you are a start-up or an established project, I am here to support your PR and marketing needs.To learn more about how my PR marketing services can benefit your project, please contact me to schedule a consultation.CONTACT:LinkedInTelegramSkypehere is the list with price and relevant information https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1AbvN0Tz4RFPpUAnVOIYPhG6m62pT-IaJdujpbM95srA/edit?usp=sharingWe have total 662 media outlets in our network with the price starting from $100, We can discuss bundles according to your budget and needs Contact for more info Outsourcing services also available Let's take your project's visibility to new heights together!
